General.Name: FocalTech Systems Co Ltd
General.Description: FocalTech Systems Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, manufacturing, and sale of human-machine interface solutions in Taiwan, China, and internationally. It offers display driver ICs, touch control ICs, and others; and LCD IDCs, AMOLEDs, touch controllers, and touch pads, as well as fingerprint and medical solutions. FocalTech Systems Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 23, Huanke 1st Rd, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 302047
